apps.name: clip2gist
apps.title: GitHub Private Gist Creator
apps.description: A web application that allows users to create private GitHub gists from clipboard content or uploaded files. The app provides a simple interface to paste text or select a file, creates a private gist via GitHub API, and returns the gist link while copying it to the clipboard.

apps.name: gh-dashboard
apps.title: GitHub Repo Status Dashboard
apps.description: A modern, responsive web dashboard for monitoring GitHub repository status. This application provides a comprehensive view of a user's repositories including build status, workflow runs, releases, and commit history.

apps.name: homepage
apps.title: Tools Collection Homepage
apps.description: - Responsive Design: Mobile-first grid layout that adapts from 1 column (mobile) to 2 columns (tablet) to 3 columns (desktop) - Modern UI: Clean cards with gradient accents, hover animations, and smooth transitions - Dark Mode Support: Full dark mode compatibility with automatic system preference detection - Static Generation: Pre-rendered at build time for optimal performance and SEO - Accessible: Semantic HTML and proper link handling for screen readers - Type Safe: Built with TypeScript for robust code quality

apps.name: taboo
apps.title: Taboo Game Project
apps.description: This is a web-based implementation of the Taboo word game, built with Next.js, React 19, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS v4. The application allows players to play the classic Taboo game entirely within the browser, with responsive design for mobile and desktop, including buzzer and timer functionality.

apps.name: unit-converter
apps.title: Unit Converter Web Application
apps.description: A responsive web application for unit conversion using natural language input (e.g., "9 cups to ml") with optional dropdown selectors for "from" and "to" units, supporting both imperial and metric systems.

apps.name: www2epub
apps.title: URL to EPUB Converter
apps.description: A web application that converts any inputted URL into an EPUB file. Users can customize the output by including or excluding media (graphics) and optimizing for e-ink devices with small screens.

apps.name: www2s
apps.title: Webpage Reader Aloud
apps.description: - URL input form - Text extraction from webpages using Readability - Native browser TTS support (SpeechSynthesis API) - Fallback to configurable TTS API - Responsive UI with Tailwind CSS - Self-hostable in Docker with environment variables

apps.name: yaml-formatter
apps.title: YAML Validator Web Application
apps.description: A responsive web application for validating and formatting YAML content. Users can input YAML via copy/paste or file upload, validate its syntax, and format it with configurable indentation spacing. All data is stored locally in the browser.
